Reviews.Title: I only dislike ONE thing...
Reviews.Author: Amy
Reviews.Content: The good points: Windows 8 is NOT as bad as you were made to think.  Don't let that be your deciding factor; you can even make it look like Windows 7.  I like the ability to (semi-easily) customize the trackpad, though the fact that the default is backwards confounds me. I LOVE the mute button, though I wish Home, End, Page Up, and Page Down were their own buttons (this is a 17" laptop, for goodness' sake -- I  had it on my 15"!).The bad point: (which bothers me a lot for some reason) There are NO visual indicators for NumLock or CapsLock.  It gets cumbersome when you don't notice you've hit 'CapsLock' instead of 'A' five sentences ago.The good aspects outweigh the bad overall, and this DEFINITELY beats my old laptop that can't charge, so I suggest this one.

Reviews.Title: Big screen at a very good price!
Reviews.Author: Stefan Sommerfield
Reviews.Content: Gateway's NE71 series, priced in the mid 300's offers excellent features, led by the 17" screen. Processor (dual-Core) is not the fastest, but that is a price function. Works fine for most home uses, Has a dual function dvd/cd drive that will play blu-ray movies, and the screen quality is near HD quality. Getting used to the windows 8 interface, and some of the apps do not work as well as the website (E-Bay for example).Overall a good value for general home use.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Raymond E. Kobeski "RayK"
Reviews.Content: Great laptop and couldn't beat the price.  Looks fantastic and runs like a champ.  You can't go wrong with this and it's price.

Reviews.Title: Affordable & Great!
Reviews.Author: R. Haselton "DJ Spicy"
Reviews.Content: This Gateway laptop is a great value for a 17" computer. I just wish there was an easy manual to learn how to use the new Windows 8 programs.

Reviews.Title: Best laptop I have owned.
Reviews.Author: S. F. Roethle
Reviews.Content: I have found nothing to dislike about this computer. It boots up very quickly and withthe improvements on windows 8 it is the best laptop I have owned.

Reviews.Title: Great machine but Windows 8 sucks
Reviews.Author: P. M. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: The computer is great. I have mostly had Gateway computers because I like them. I had a Toshiba once that I loved as well but Gateway is more my style. The only thing I do not like thus far about this laptop is Windows 8. I can definitely see some great aspects to it but it is like learning a whole new operating system. I was replacing my old laptop which died on me hoping to get a similar model, which I did, with the exception of upgrading from Windows 7 to 8. The new software is so different that I am stull learning it weeks later and have not figured it all out. I am getting tired of constantly having to learn a new version of Windows ever few years!

Reviews.Title: I LOVE MY GATEWAY!
Reviews.Author: Lady Rain
Reviews.Content: As far as I'm concerned, GATEWAY is the only way to go!  I purchased my first GATEWAY desktop in 1999 +/- and it lasted nearly 10 years.  I gave my laptop to my daughter and updated mine.  It's great technology at an excellent price.

Reviews.Title: Gateway 17.3 inch Widows 8 Laptop
Reviews.Author: Ken Steele
Reviews.Content: My very first laptop. It's great. Pros... Love  the Windows 8 version. Very fast, bright LCD screen. Downside... not a touch screen.

Reviews.Title: Low mark for Windows 8
Reviews.Author: Horacio Fabres
Reviews.Content: I did not like the new Windows interface, I am used to the old one and just wanted a better performance and faster turning on an off.About the computer itself, I don't like the keyboard arrangement with the small arrow keys and odd function keys. I would like a caps led too.As for the screen and the HDMI interface, they are superb. The large mouse pad is convenient.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop
Reviews.Author: Michelle
Reviews.Content: This is the perfect computer for my usage, I love the 17 inch screen.  Windows 8 isn't as bad as all the reviews I have read

Reviews.Title: scratched cover - poor battery; Windows 8 is a mess
Reviews.Author: Larry Myers
Reviews.Content: Wish we would have done something different - we chose this for a college computer for my daughter and have been very disappointed so far.

Reviews.Title: laptop
Reviews.Author: Dolores
Reviews.Content: this has been a great laptop for my husband, he only had to get use to windows 8, I really like gateway computers, we also havea gateway desktop
